findings.current_content: ISO 13485:2003 certification or FDA inspection within 2 years
findings.research_summary: ISO 13485:2003 was officially WITHDRAWN when ISO 13485:2016 was published on March 1, 2016. The 2016 version has been the current standard for nearly 10 years.

The actual tax rate timeline is: (1) Jan 2018 - June 30, 2025: 15% under Prop 64/AB 195, (2) July 1 - Sept 30, 2025: 19% from AB 195's biennial adjustment, (3) Oct 1, 2025 - June 30, 2028: 15% under AB 564 (signed Sept 22, 2025). The file incorrectly states 2023-2024 was 19% - it was actually 15% throughout. AB 564 (not AB 195) restored the 15% rate.
findings.recommended_fix: Correct history table to: 2018-June 2025: 15%, July-Sept 2025: 19%, Oct 2025-June 2028: 15% (AB 564). Note biennial review mechanism starting FY 2028-29.

findings.research_summary: File already contains 2025-26 income thresholds with verification date of 2025-12-23. Data sourced from CCRC 2025-26 State Median Income Schedule based on 2023 ACS data. No update needed.
sources: ccrcca.org (California Child Care Resource & Referral Network)

summary.next_steps: Apply fixes to Manufacturing_Licensing_Guide.md and Cannabis_Licensing_Guide.md, then re-embed affected chunks
